name: Dr.Sreeja N K
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  ( Physics )  - Bharathiar University   - 2000M.C.A  - Avinashilingam Deemed University   - 2003Ph.D  ( Computer Science )  - Anna University  - 05/11/2016Supervisor: Dr.A.Sankar
in_brief:
Dr.Sreeja N.K is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Applied Mathematics and
Computational Sciences at PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore. She has over 14 years of experience in teaching. Her Research interests span Machine Learning, Soft Computing and Pattern Recognition. She has around 11 publications in various Journals, Edited Book chapters and International/National
Conference Proceedings. She is a recognized Research Supervisor in Anna University, Chennai.

publications.title: A hierarchical heterogeneous ant colony optimization based fingerprint recognition system
A weighted pattern matching approach for classification of imbalanced data with a fireworks-based algorithm for feature selection
A hierarchical heterogeneous ant colony optimization based approach for efficient action rule mining
An image edge based approach for image password encryption
Pattern matching based classification using ant colony optimization based feature selection
Ant colony optimization based binary search for efficient point pattern matching in images
